channel.title: GreenPlum on Asky
channel.description: Recent content in GreenPlum on Asky

item.title: 源码编译 GreenPlum 速通版
item.description: shell git clone --depth=1 https://hub.fgit.cf/greenplum-db/gpdb.git -b 7.0.0 docker run -itd --name gpdb --cap-add=SYS_PTRACE --privileged=true --hostname vscode --mount type=bind,source=/home/wen/gpdb,target=/workspaces/gpdb runner bash docker exec -it -u vscode gpdb bash sudo service ssh start ssh-keygen cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys chmod 700 ~/.ssh chmod 644 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys sudo chown vscode:vscode -R /workspaces/gpdb # 不支持其他文件夹编译，只能在gpdb目录下 cd /workspaces/gpdb sudo apt install -y libkrb5-dev krb5-config iproute2 libossp-uuid-dev libapr1-dev libyaml-dev libxerces-c-dev less rsync pip libevent-dev ./configure --with-perl --enable-orca --with-python --with-libxml --with-gssapi --enable-debug CFLAGS=-O0 CXXFLAGS=-O0 --prefix=/home/vscode/.build make -j64 && make install # .bashrc 文件 cat > /home/vscode/.bashrc <<EOF source /home/vscode/.build/greenplum_path.sh alias psql='psql -p 7000' alias gpstart='gpstart -d /workspaces/gpdb/gpAux/gpdemo/datadirs/qddir/demoDataDir-1' alias gpstop='gpstop -d /workspaces/gpdb/gpAux/gpdemo/datadirs/qddir/demoDataDir-1' alias sqps="echo 'USER PID PPID VSZ CMD' ; ps -eo user,pid,ppid,vsize,cmd | grep -E 'postgres' " EOF
